reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting policy in China by holding the Second UK-China Forum on Social Policy and Public Sector Reform

description.narrative: The project is designed to bring together influential officials, scholars and practitioners from China and the UK at a Second UK-China Forum on Social Policy and Public Sector Reform, in order to influence central government policy, social policy issues and public sector reform in line with China's 13th Five-Year Plan. The targeted policy areas include open data, civil contingency, public service delivery and government performance evaluation.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
